div.p:
The last day of septembre the yher' of oure lorde a thousand four' hundre
sevynte and thre yheris John' of pantoun of petmethane hase in the
tolbuth of Aberdene the aldirman beand present with the maste parte of the commown
consale hase purely and symply resignit and oure giffin to the aldirman and
to the consale all rycht and clame of rycht that he hade or hase to the toun'
of the Crois and put hym all anerly in the aldirmanis and consalis wil and
to thaim to do til hym as it plesit thaim to do anent the forsaid tak clamit
be hym of termis tocum of the forsaid toun' of the Crois / the Aldirman and the
consale wele avisit hase decretit and delyuerit that the said John' of pantoun'
because that he summittit hym to thaim sall bruke Jois' and remayn with the toun' of
the Crois quhil quhitsonday next tocum and next eftir folouand the date of
this write and than he sall devoyde hym oute of the said toun' but
ony questioun' demaunde or contrar' to giddir and all his gudis and neid to mak
clame fra thynefurth' til othir rycht or tak the forsaid toun' of the Crois
and als' thai hafe delyuerit that Dauy symson sal bruk and Joise the tak at he
hade of Jonet menyeis of the fyschyng of the Crois for the termis at he tuk
it for' f the forsaid Jonet payand to John' of pantoun the male at he is awand

Memorandum quod henricus bawne pelliparius composuit com preposito tempore prepositure
Andree alani quod legitime probatur per condignos testes coram preposito moderno et quod
erat receptus in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde pro quibus soluit vt patet
in compoto Roberti culan pro tunc decani gilde

The said last day of Septembre . In presence of the aldirman and the consel Alexander meignes
protestit that quhatsumevir ende or decrete that thai had deliuerit to Johne of panton
of petmethen . tweching and pertenand the tak of the toune of the Croois and the fisching
that pertenit til his avnt Jonet meignes to the quhilkis he clamys him to hafe
rycht and reson be way of the said Jonet meignes sulde turne til him to na preiudice
nor hendre in tyme tocum . In alsfer as he may prefe that he has rycht and reson
til his clame of the forsaid tak and fisching

Eodem die Thomas de camera comparens ad barram protestatus fuit
pro quodam annuo redditu ijrum solidorum sibi annuatim debit' et a longo tempore
non solut' de vna terra Jacente ad capud vici castri veluti continetur
in processibus precedentibus Ad quam terram personaliter accedens nichil reperit distringibile
ad dictum annuum redditum recuperandum preter terram et lapides quos presentauit
in curia coram ballivis tanquam quarto die huius processus Testibus Willelmo cumming
Johanne meirnys et Duncano straloch sergeando huius burgi vnde dictus
thomas pecijt a ballivis secundum formam suorum processuum Juris et Justicie comple
mentum Et balliui propter debilitatem curie posuerunt decisionem dicti
processus et warde in respectu vsque ad proximum diem legalem cum consensu parcium et cetera

Item eodem die Alexander de camera et dominus patricius tulloch capellanus procuratores et
eo nomine altaris beate Katerine in ecclesia parrochiali beati Nicholai huius burgi accedens
ad barram protestati sanctis pro quodam annuo redditu sex solidorum et octo denario
rum de vna terra Jacente in vico viridi inter ecclesiam et domum fratrum carmelitarum
ex parte australi et terram hered' cuiusdam cowtis ex parte boreali ex
parte altra . Ad quam terram dictus dominus patricius personaliter accedens nichil reperit
distringibile ad dictum annuum redditum recuperandum preter terram et lapides quos
presentauit in curia coram ballivis tamquam primo die huius processus Testibus
georgio browne Johanne clerk et Duncano straloch vno seriandorum

ITem dicto die patricius adamson filius et heres quondam Willelmi ade burgensis
huius burgi accedens ad barram protestatus fuit pro vno annuo redditu xv s'
de quadam terra Jacente ad li scule hil inter terram Jacobi crag ex parte
orientali et terram Andree scherar ex parte occidentali Ad quam terram personaliter
accedens nichil reperit distringibile ad dictum annuum redditum recuperandum preter
terram et lapides quos presentavit in curia tanquam tercio die huius processus
Testibus Johanne clerk et georgio browne cum Duncano straloch sergeando

Eodem die venerabilis in Christo pater dominus Willelmus evyot Abbas de Deer'
protestatus fuit quod quicquid predicta assisa deliberaret penes deseruicionem
breuis Inquisicionis Regij part concernentis terras quondam Johannis voket Jacentes in
vico furcarum et cetera clamatas per magistrum Willelmum voket fratrem germanum

rum in futuris

head.add: protestacio ex parte capituli et capellanorum ecclesie cathedralis aberdonensis

div.p:
Item eodem die magister Alexander Vaus Officialis aberdonensis nomine et ex parte capituli et
capellanorum ecclesie cathedralis Aberdonensis protestatus fuit pro quodam crofto clamato
per dictum magistrum Willelmum vokat Jacente ad finem vici furcarum inter croftum

ex boreali parte ex parte altra / et quod quicquid factum fuerat seu deliberat
per predictam assisam non cedat eis in preiudicium Jurium suorum penes dictum croftum

fidem domini nostri regis de vno annuo redditu xiij s' et iiij d' exeunt' annuatim et

Jus suum minime prosequentis dat' et claus'

The viii day of Nouembre the yer' of god et cetera lxxiij the Aldirman and consel
has decretit ordand and deliuerit that Wil mathoson second son til vmquhile
Johne mathoson burges of aberdene salbe deliuerit til ser Johne of yet peniten
ciar' to my lord of Aberdene becaus' that he was left til him as tutor testa
mentare be his fader as is kend and knavin til the said aldirman and consel
And heratour the said ser Johne sal fynde sikkir souertie and borowis be the
sicht of the Aldirman and consel that all the gudis belanging to the said barne
salbe furth cumand til the proffit of the said barne quhen he cumis til lagh
full age

heratour it is ordand be the Aldirman and consel that the said ser Johne of yet sal
present to thame suffisant men til hafe in keping the gudis of the said Wil
mathoson of the quhilkis the aldirman and consel salbe content / And thai men
sal fynde to the aldirman and consel gude souertie that the gudis belanging
to the said barne salbe furth cumand til the barnys proffit quhen he cumis
til laghfull age

The xiii day of nouembre the yer' of god et cetera sevinty and thre It is fundyn be the aldir

is richtwis' Are til his fadir vmquhile William lammynton quhom god assoilye
and has resone to hafe his fadir ayrschip of sik gudis as he pretendit
til hafe in his bil present to the aldirman and baillies gif his fader had sik
gudis in the house of his decesse et cetera

Item eodem die Robertus Nicholaus club legitime vocatus et peremptorie ad respondendum plegio per Alexandrum colison contra eundem
porrecto pro iniusta detencione sex solidorum et vj d' pro quodam naulo qui quidem Nicolaus robertus non comparuit
quare thomas fiffe prelocutor dicti alexandri extendit plegium in manibus Duncani straloch vnius
seriandorum quod ipse alexander peruenit ad clameum suum contra dictum Nicholaum robertum causa non defensa vnde
hora diei legitima expectata et dicto Nicholao roberto non comparenti decretum fuit per curiam et datum
pro iudicio per os Willelmi serra Judicatoris dicte curie ad instanciam partis prosequentis quod dictus
Alexander colison peruenit legitime ad clameum suum de dictis vj s' et vj d' contra prefatum robertum Nicho
laum causa non defensa soluendis infra terminum Juris Et quod dictus Nicholaus robertus adiudicatur in
amerciamento istius pro absencia sua ab eadem

Quo die Willelmus moyses dixit in facie curie coram balliuis quod nuncquam vellet
